org.echo.mobile.framework.core.crypto

Interface CryptoCoreComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CryptoCoreComponentImpl

    public CryptoCoreComponent

    Encapsulates logic, associated with keys generation and encryption/decryption processes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decodeFromWif(java.lang.String source)
      Decodes private key in wif format source to the raw bytes representation
      java.lang.String decryptMessage(byte[] privateKey, byte[] publicKey, java.math.BigInteger nonce, byte[] message)
      Decrypts string message using input keys

      • encryptMessage

        byte[] encryptMessage(byte[] privateKey,
                      byte[] publicKey,
                      java.math.BigInteger nonce,
                      java.lang.String message)

        Encrypts string message using input keys

        Parameters:
        privateKey - Private key of one of the transfer operation parties
        publicKey - Public key of another participant of transfer
        nonce - Random entropy of memo payload for deriving unique key for every transfer
        message - Message for encrypting

      • decryptMessage

        java.lang.String decryptMessage(byte[] privateKey,
                                byte[] publicKey,
                                java.math.BigInteger nonce,
                                byte[] message)

        Decrypts string message using input keys

        Parameters:
        privateKey - Private key of one of the transfer operation parties
        publicKey - Public key of another participant of transfer
        nonce - Random entropy of memo payload for deriving unique key for every transfer
        message - Message for decrypting

      • encodeToWif

        java.lang.String encodeToWif(byte[] source)

        Encodes private key in raw string representation to wif format

      • decodeFromWif

        byte[] decodeFromWif(java.lang.String source)

        Decodes private key in wif format source to the raw bytes representation
